name: Terminal Invaders
description:
Terminal Invaders is (as the name suggests) a text-based, fast-paced clone of Space Invaders with a very slight twist: the mistery ship can drops power ups... everything is explained in the in-game instructions!
Many of you may wonder "yeah, why another space invaders clone?", well, I was bored and, while I was dabbling with C and this BearLibTerminal library that I found on the internet, I said to myself "why not?" and here we are!
If you are bored as well and you have nothing more interesting to do, play my game and waste no more than 5 minute of your life.. oh, and try to make a new high score!

Requirements:
The linux version needs SDL2 and SDL2_mixer to be installed (the BearLibTerminal library is included in the zip file).
The windows version already has everything needed in the archive.
The macos version... is coming soon!

Enjoy! :)
